Name: Kagura's Dreamland 神樂夢境
About the game: A cute, joyful, and casual light adventure, welcome to Kagura's Dreamland ! Fantasy World of a High School Girl Kagura's Dreamland contains 16 adventure levels plus 3 special levels, totaling 19 maps with different features for players to explore. On the way, players will go through forests, deserts, snowfields, gorges, etc., encounter different monsters, learn new skills, and defeat the ultimate enemy. You can collect crystals on the map and trade them for more powerful weapons to face more dangerous challenges. In addition, after rounds of battle, Kagura's level will increase, allowing her to perform more powerful attacks. Unbearably cute little creatures! These little bears and kittens are so cute that it's a shame you have to fight them in your dreams. But don't worry, no little creatures are harmed in these dreams. Refreshing Music Each level is accompanied by relaxing music, which is different from the tense action games, and Kagura is only enjoyable along the way. Farm in Wonderland The pets of Kagura have been lost in the dream world, traverse various levels and bring them back to the farm in wonderland.
